body_html: I've updated ReadFileToProtoOrDie internally to help it live up to the latter part of its name in the case of pb files not being found. Also added a check that the resulting GraphDef has > 0 nodes to catch anything else slipping through. Should be getting pushed to GitHub soon, so hopefully that will help discriminate between loading errors and actual TF issues.

body: I've updated ReadFileToProtoOrDie internally to help it live up to the latter part of its name in the case of pb files not being found. Also added a check that the resulting GraphDef has > 0 nodes to catch anything else slipping through. Should be getting pushed to GitHub soon, so hopefully that will help discriminate between loading errors and actual TF issues.
